overview_of_class: Journalism Residency in Magazine (2 units). Exploration of aspects of magazine writing and reporting. Practical assignments, including print and web content whenever possible, in a magazine office with deadline pressure and close professional supervision.
name: Journalism Residency: Magazine Writing
title: DOHA JOUR 355-0-70 Journalism Residency: Magazine Writing
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: NUQ: Journalism Juniors and above. And JOUR 342 with a C or better or JOUR 368 with a C or better.
Add Consent: Department Consent Required

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Journalism Residency in Magazine (2 units). Exploration of aspects of magazine writing and reporting. Practical assignments, including print and web content whenever possible, in a magazine office with deadline pressure and close professional supervision.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
• Prerequisites: Must enroll and obtain a C or better for JOUR 390-0 Special topics: "Exploring the Future of Digital Journalism". And enroll for JOUR 342 OR JOUR 368 and obtain a C or better.

  • Open to juniors and above JOUR majors only

subject: JOUR
